item.title: Fumen
item.description: Fumen is a board editor made by knewjade. It is the most commonly used board editor and allows the exporting of multiple board states in a single fumen code.

item.title: Parameter: Patterns
item.description: The –patterns parameter for [[sfinder-docs/solution-finder|solution-finder]] is one of the harder parameters to understand. This page is dedicated to providing a thorough explanation and examples on the various aspects of specifying patterns.

item.title: Solution Finder
item.description: Solution Finder, often referred to as sfinder, is a program created by knewjade, who’s also responsible for various other tools. It is the cornerstone of Tetris-related research such as for [[openers]], [[loops]], and [[perfect clearing]].

item.title: Solution Finder Prerequisites
item.description: Here are a bunch of prerequisites for sfinder and its branches. Command Line Inputs Command Line Inputs are commands entered into a terminal.

item.title: Solution Finder: Path
item.description: Solution Finder’s Path command outputs all the ways to get a perfect clear from a specified field, given a specified pattern.

item.title: Solution Finder: Percent
item.description: Solution Finder’s Percent command outputs the probability of getting a perfect clear from a specified field, given a specified pattern. This output is written in the terminal and the specified [[#^b09600|Log Path]].
